A bus carrying 25 people , most of which foreign tourists , on their way to visit the Peles castle in Sinaia fell into a ravine near the Romanian mountain resort of Brasov last weekend , according to Mediafax newswire .
The bus was carrying 22 Belgian tourists , a tour guide and two drivers .
All the passengers were taken to the nearest hospital , while one of them who suffered heavier injuries was taken by helicopter to Targu Mures .
All the passengers were taken to the nearest hospital , while one of them who suffered heavier injuries was taken by helicopter to Targu Mures .
Preliminary data show the 67 - year old bus driver lost control of the vehicle because of a technical malfunction .
Preliminary data show the 67 - year old bus driver lost control of the vehicle because of a technical malfunction .
The bus belonged to travel agency Rovial .

Authorities are currently investigating the cause of the accident .
